mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.name as product_name, p.description as product_description, p.price as product_price, p.stock_quantity as product_stock, p.image_url as product_image FROM cart_items c JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.*, p.name as product_name, p.description as product_description, p.price as product_price, p.stock_quantity as product_stock, p.image_url as product_image FROM cart_items c JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.product_id = #{productId}
